panels.description:
Apdex = (Satisfied Reqs + (Tolerating Reqs / 2)) / Total Reqs 

Exclude register

targets.expr:
(
  sum(rate(server_request_seconds_bucket{instance="$instance", uri!="/v1/auth/register", le="0.536870911"}[$__range])) 
  +
  (
    sum(rate(server_request_seconds_bucket{instance="$instance", uri!="/v1/auth/register", le="1.431655765"}[$__range])) 
    - sum(rate(server_request_seconds_bucket{instance="$instance", uri!="/v1/auth/register", le="0.536870911"}[$__range])) 
  ) / 2
) / 
sum(rate(server_request_seconds_bucket{instance="$instance", uri!="/v1/auth/register", le="+Inf"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Apdex Score (<540ms | <1.4s) - (exclude register)

targets.legendFormat: {{method}}, {{uri}}, {{status}}, req_jwt={{request_with_jwt}}, fallback_err={{is_fallback_error}}, err_code={{error_code}}, err_name={{error_name}}, err_msg={{error_message}}, exception={{exception}}

targets.expr: irate(server_request_seconds_sum{application="$application", instance=~"$instance", uri!~"(/|.*(actuator).*)", method!~"OPTIONS", status=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]) / irate(server_request_seconds_count{application="$application", instance=~"$instance",method!~"OPTIONS", uri!~"(/|.*(actuator).*)", status=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval])

targets.legendFormat: {{method}}, {{uri}}, {{status}}, req_jwt={{request_with_jwt}}, fallback_err={{is_fallback_error}}, err_code={{error_code}}, err_name={{error_name}}, err_msg={{error_message}}, exception={{exception}}

targets.expr: topk(25, sum by(error, error_code, error_message) (increase(sos_business_user_register_seconds_count{instance="$instance", error!~"none"}[$__range])))
topk(25, sum by(error, error_code, error_message) (increase(server_request_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", uri=~"/v1/auth/login", error_code!="none"}[$__range])))
